raw_text:
Based on the paper content, I'll extract the structured information:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Transfers and Agricultural Extension: Independent and Combined Effects in Malawi",
    "matches_expected_title": "NO"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "NASFAM Agricultural Support Program",
    "country": "Malawi",
    "region": null,
    "target_population": "Smallholder farmers"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": true,
      "cash_support_type": "framed cash transfers",
      "cash_amount": "US$84 total ($36 at planting, $22 midseason, $26 at harvest)",
      "cash_frequency": "three installments in first year only",
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": "For the transfer treatment, farmers were randomly allocated to a control group that received no transfers; a cash group that received a series of three framed cash transfers, 1 at planting (US$36), 2 midseason ($22), and harvest ($26)"
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": true,
      "assets_provided": ["seeds", "hoes", "inoculant", "storage sacks"],
      "direct_provision": "YES",
      "assets_evidence_citation": "and an input group that received transfers of equivalent value, of which approximately 50 percent were given in kind (seed, hoes, inoculant, storage sacks)"
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "crop production",
      "yields",
      "productive investments",
      "agricultural practices",
      "farm management",
      "household assets",
      "savings",
      "food consumption",
      "nonfood consumption"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "We examine program impacts by measuring impacts first of the transfers, then of the intensive extension services, and finally of their interaction. For each section of results, we first examine the impact on crop production and yields in the first and second year... we consider the welfare impacts for each set of interventions by examining total household assets and savings, as well as food and nonfood consumption aggregates",
    "study_design": "Randomized Controlled Trial (RCT)",
    "design_evidence_citation": "We implemented the program in partnership with the National Smallholder Farmers' Association of Malawi (NASFAM) and worked with approximately 1,200 households randomly allocated at the farmer club level (120 clubs in total) to the transfer and agricultural training treatments",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2015-2017",
    "sample_size": 1200,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": false,
    "qualitative_methods": [],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": null,
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "We implemented the program in partnership with the National Smallholder Farmers' Association of Malawi (NASFAM)",
    "country_citation": "We implemented the program in partnership with the National Smallholder Farmers' Association of Malawi (NASFAM)",
    "target_population_citation": "improving agricultural productivity cannot be ignored in countries like Malawi, where 80 percent of the population is smallholder farmers"
  }
}
```
